idea:
DUMBBELL Production`s creative teams are experts at content development

and on-set execution: From pre- through post-production, our teams possess

the skills to produce quality video work, making both DUMBBELL Productions

and our valued clients proud.

Whether the project is a long-form, industrial or corporate video, a multi-video

campaign, or a 30 second TV spot, DUMBBELL welcomes the opportunity to

work with new and returning clients to create powerful and creative videos

regardless of shoot location and/or production challenges.
name: DUMBBELL PRODUCTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: UtSide is an Online Campus Learning platform providing customized training for upskill courses in Animation , Visual Effects and Gaming. • These courses are designed and delivered by Industry experts(Mentors)who are professionals working in International Studios as Leads ,Technical Directors(TDs), Supervisor Head of Departments. • These courses are delivered through UtSide’s unique Online Learning Platform which is based on our philosophy of 4Is–Imagination ,Interactive , Immersive & Intelligence. • The State-of-the-art Online Learning Platform is a Virtual Campus App where students and mentors login , create their profiles , imagine and create their own 3D Avatars , watch interactive curriculum content ,immerse and engage with each other inside UtSideversity besides get assistance and assessment based on Artificial Intelligence.
name: UTSIDE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Chado Tea is in to exquisite tea, tea and herbal belnds previously unheard of or available in India. Products like DJ1 batch of Darjeeling First Flushes, Golden Tippy Assam are mostly exported to foreign countries. Chado is educating a creating awareness of such teas and its value and creating a market for the same in India. Along with it Flavoured tea of foreign origin, ingredients and flavour. Herbal blends in unquie pillow and pyramid tea bags with information such as origin, flavour profile and tasting notes.
name: CHADO TEA PRIVATE LIMITED
